name: Out Of The Loop
description:
You play as a steam powered robot with the ability to record clones and "loop" them.  Create clones, pause them, platform, and solve puzzles to make your way through the game.

Controls:  wasd -move

                       space - jump

                       mouse to look

                       R to record and stop recording

                       1 to restart the puzzle

                      TAB to pause and unpause the clones                                           

                             and C to clear clones

We didn't have enough time to add audio to the game but we made some music so  we'll leave it as a download.

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 47.  Original entry is labeled as Jam in downloads.  Later versions are labeled as v1.1, v1.2 etc.

Version 1.1:  Fixed a visual glitch that made pressure plates float.  Fixed various bugs involving pressure plate sensitivity.  Tweaked pressure plate materials to make it more distinctive when pressed.  Fixed some missing collision.  Tweaked the size of a block to make it easier to stand on.
